title: Amazon BSR Best Sellers Rank Explained Amazon Merch BSR Chrome Extension History Chart

tactics.name: BSR Trend Analysis
tactics.description: Use BSR history charts to estimate sales volume and track product performance over time
steps: Install Chrome extensions like Amazon Quick View for real-time BSR data
Monitor 30-day BSR charts from tools like merch.lytx
Correlate BSR drops with potential sales spikes
caveats: BSR doesn't indicate exact sales numbers
source_quotes: this shirt's BSR dropped is what this is doing

tactics.name: BSR Sales Correlation
tactics.description: Use BSR rank changes to estimate daily sales volume and track product performance over time
steps: Correlate sales spikes with rank drops
caveats: Seasonal sales variations can skew BSR metrics
source_quotes: Each jump brings it down a little bit more kind of keeps cutting it in half

tactics.name: BSR for Sales Estimation
tactics.description: Use BSR to estimate recent sales volume and competition levels
steps: Compare BSR with search result count
Analyze sales frequency based on BSR thresholds
caveats: Seasonal trends may skew BSR data
source_quotes: if it's under 5 million BSR it's probably made at least one sale in the last month

heuristics.name: Review Volume Benchmark
heuristics.condition: If product has fewer than 200 reviews, prioritize for market validation
source_quotes: funny IT t-shirts on Google has ninety thousand five hundred searches per month

heuristics.name: Low Review Threshold
heuristics.condition: If product has low review count, prioritize sales data over BSR
source_quotes: Five sales in the last 30 days which is pretty cool

heuristics.name: Low Review Competition
heuristics.condition: If search results exceed 10,000 but BSR remains above 5 million, prioritize niche opportunities
source_quotes: 700 people competing for this phrase for right now 7 sales

claims.statement: Amazon BSR rankings can indicate sales volume trends but not exact units sold
source_quotes: it might have been a five sale shirt

claims.statement: BSR rank can skew based on annual sales volume fluctuations
source_quotes: Depending on the year how many sales are happening

claims.statement: High BSR ranks don't always correlate with actual sales volume
source_quotes: Five million BSR so it's sold earlier this month

claims.statement: Higher BSR values indicate slower sales velocity and lower demand
source_quotes: as the BSRs get higher and we're in a slower time of year

niche_patterns.description: Identify underserved niches with specific demographic constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines broad identity with specific problem and constraint for niche targeting
source_quotes: this is a very competitive niche

niche_patterns.description: Niche variations that reduce competition while maintaining relevance
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Physical product attributes can create differentiation in crowded categories
source_quotes: what happens if I do long sleeve all right that brought it down a little bit
